title: IIT Kanpur Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for Senior Project Mechanic Post
description: Indian Institute of Technology Kanpur (IIT Kanpur) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Senior Project Mechanic Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the ITI, Diploma in Electrical Engineering can grab this chance and apply for the IIT Kanpur Recruitment 2025 . Here, we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply bef...
